item.title: Hint
item.description: Background Apache ShardingSphere uses ThreadLocal to manage primary database routing marks for mandatory routing. A primary database routing mark can be added to HintManager through programming, and this value is valid only in the current thread. Hint is mainly used to perform mandatory data operations in the primary database for read/write splitting scenarios. Procedure Call HintManager.getInstance() to obtain HintManager instance. Call HintManager.setWriteRouteOnly() method to set the primary database routing marks.
